title: Wall Street Breakfast October 13:  September's CPI Likely To Show 'stickier' Costs Rising More, Economists Say
author: Seeking Alpha

description: September's CPI Likely To Show 'stickier' Costs Rising More, Economists Say. S&P, Dow, Nasdaq futures tick higher with all eyes on CPI. U.K. plays blame game: Finance minister says Bank of England owns market turmoil. Catch today’s WSB article https://seekingalpha.com/wsb.
